title: Girls' Generation discography
summary: South Korea-based girl group Girls' Generation have released nine studio albums (four of which were reissued under different titles), two live albums, four extended plays (EPs), and twenty-eight singles. As of November 2012, Girls' Generation has sold over 4.4 million albums and 30 million digital singles.[1] The group has sold over 1.74 million albums in South Korea as of December 2014,[upper-alpha 1] and 3.48 million records, including over 945,000 physical singles and 1.9 million albums in Japan as of January 2017.[3]
